scripts.watch: concurrently --kill-others "npx tailwindcss -i assets/css/tailwind.css -o assets/css/main.css --watch" "JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload"
scripts.build:dev: npx tailwindcss -i assets/css/tailwind.css -o assets/css/main.css && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:prod: npx tailwindcss -i assets/css/tailwind.css -o assets/css/main.min.css --minify && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
